name: tfjs-basic-chrome-extension
description: Use tfjs model.predict in a chrome extension

scripts.copy: cp src/content.js dist/src/ && cp src/content-main.js dist/src/ && cp src/content2.js dist/src/ && cp src/content-get-device-access.js dist/src/
scripts.build: parcel build src/background.js -d dist/src/ -o background --no-minify && npm run copy
scripts.watch: npm run copy && parcel watch src/background.js --hmr-hostname localhost -d dist/src/ -o background
